20110109061019.000|20110109061020.000|CC1|>>> GRIEF AND CHRONIC ILLNESS   
20110109061020.000|20110109061023.000|CC1|HAVE NOTICEABLY AGED PAT OLSON  
20110109061023.000|20110109061024.000|CC1|SINCE HER HUSBAND'S DEATH IN    
20110109061024.000|20110109061027.000|CC1|JANUARY, 2005.                  
20110109061027.000|20110109061028.000|CC1|BULLET EVEN NOW HER EYES LIGHT  
20110109061028.000|20110109061030.000|CC1|UP WHEN RECALLING THAT SPRING   
20110109061030.000|20110109061035.000|CC1|DAY IN 1994 WHEN SHE SAYS SHE   
20110109061035.000|20110109061036.000|CC1|MARRIED THE LOVE OF HER LIFE.   
20110109061036.000|20110109061038.000|CC1|>> FROM THE MOMENT I MET HIM,   
20110109061038.000|20110109061038.000|CC1|THERE WAS SOMETHING ABOUT HIM   
20110109061038.000|20110109061042.000|CC1|THAT WAS JUST INCREDIBLE.

20110109063114.000|20110109063117.000|CC1|>>> WITHIN DAYS OF NEIL OLSEN'S 
20110109063117.000|20110109063118.000|CC1|DEATH, POLICE ARRESTED HIS      
20110109063118.000|20110109063120.000|CC1|STEPSON AND CHARGED HIM WITH    
20110109063120.000|20110109063120.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110109063120.000|20110109063123.000|CC1|NOT ONLY HAD CHRIS ROBINSON     
20110109063123.000|20110109063124.000|CC1|CONFESSED TO THE KILLING, HE    
20110109063124.000|20110109063126.000|CC1|ALSO CLAIMED HIS MOTHER MADE HIM
20110109063126.000|20110109063127.000|CC1|DO IT.                          
20110109063127.000|20110109063129.000|CC1|IT TURNS OUT THAT WAS A CLAIM   
20110109063129.000|20110109063132.000|CC1|THAT COULD NOT BE IGNORED.      
20110109063132.000|20110109063134.000|CC1|DETECTIVES SUSPECTED NEIL'S     
20110109063134.000|20110109063137.000|CC1|WIDOW, PAT OLSEN, MAY HAVE HAD A
20110109063137.000|20110109063141.000|CC1|FINANCIAL MOTIVE FOR WANTING HIM
20110109063141.000|20110109063141.000|CC1|DEAD.                           
20110109063141.000|20110109063143.000|CC1|WHAT THEY DIDN'T HAVE WAS ANY   
20110109063143.000|20110109063145.000|CC1|CREDIBLE EVIDENCE THAT PAT WAS  
20110109063145.000|20110109063147.000|CC1|INVOLVED IN HER HUSBAND'S       
20110109063147.000|20110109063148.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110109063148.000|20110109063149.000|CC1|>> YOU WANT TO HEAR THE BEST    
20110109063149.000|20110109063150.000|CC1|PART?                           
20110109063150.000|20110109063152.000|CC1|>> THEN WEEKS AFTER THE MURDER  
20110109063152.000|20110109063153.000|CC1|DETECTIVES DISCOVERED PHONE     
20110109063153.000|20110109063154.000|CC1|RECORDINGS IN A NEW YORK CITY   
20110109063154.000|20110109063156.000|CC1|PRISON, HUNDREDS OF MILES FROM  
20110109063156.000|20110109063157.000|CC1|THE CRIME SCENE.                
20110109063157.000|20110109063159.000|CC1|>> YOU'D NEVER DO ANYTHING TO   
20110109063159.000|20110109063159.000|CC1|HURT ME, WOULD YOU.             
20110109063159.000|20110109063202.000|CC1|>> WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?  
20110109063202.000|20110109063203.000|CC1|>> THE VOICES BELONGED TO PAT'S 
20110109063203.000|20110109063205.000|CC1|DAUGHTER, AMANDA, AND HER       
20110109063205.000|20110109063207.000|CC1|BOYFRIEND DOING TIME FOR A      
20110109063207.000|20110109063207.000|CC1|PAROLE INVESTIGATION.           
20110109063207.000|20110109063210.000|CC1|>> TOLD YOU THAT?               
20110109063210.000|20110109063210.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110109063210.000|20110109063212.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S SIGNIFICANT IS THAT   
20110109063212.000|20110109063213.000|CC1|THIS CONVERSATION WAS RECORDED  
20110109063213.000|20110109063216.000|CC1|HOURS BEFORE NEIL OLSEN WAS     
20110109063216.000|20110109063217.000|CC1|KILLED.

20110109063219.000|20110109063222.000|CC1|SHE AND NEIL WERE HAPPILY

20110109065045.000|20110109065047.000|CC1|PRISCILLA HALL KEPT A STEADY    
20110109065047.000|20110109065048.000|CC1|ROUTINE, RISING EARLY TO DRIVE  
20110109065048.000|20110109065051.000|CC1|FROM HER VERMONT HOME TO THE    
20110109065051.000|20110109065052.000|CC1|MASSACHUSETTS COURTHOUSE WHERE  
20110109065052.000|20110109065053.000|CC1|HER DAUGHTER, PAT, WAS ON TRIAL 
20110109065053.000|20110109065058.000|CC1|FOR MURDERING HER HUSBAND.      
20110109065058.000|20110109065059.000|CC1|ALL THAT TIME IN THE CAR GAVE   
20110109065059.000|20110109065101.000|CC1|HER TIME TO THINK ABOUT WHAT    
20110109065101.000|20110109065103.000|CC1|SHE'D BEEN HEARING IN COURT.

20110109065104.000|20110109065108.000|CC1|HAD ALREADY CONFESSED TO KILLING
20110109065108.000|20110109065108.000|CC1|HIS STEPFATHER.

20110109065113.000|20110109065114.000|CC1|PROSECUTOR PIN THE BLAME ON     
20110109065114.000|20110109065115.000|CC1|THEIR MOTHER, PAT.

20110109065754.000|20110109065758.000|CC1|>> LET ME CLARIFY ABOUT HOW I

20110109065805.000|20110109065808.000|CC1|WATCHING WHAT WAS HAPPENING WITH

20110109065809.000|20110109065812.000|CC1|>> IN NORMAN ROCKWELL'S ICONIC  
20110109065812.000|20110109065815.000|CC1|FREEDOM FROM WANT PAINTING, THE 
20110109065815.000|20110109065817.000|CC1|BERKSHIRE'S BEST KNOWN ARTIST   
20110109065817.000|20110109065818.000|CC1|SHOWS AN AMERICAN FAMILY THE WAY
